mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectDspGodPrc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MALL_ID , GOD_NO , PRC_SECT_CD , LANG_CD , CRNCY_CD , RTL_PRC , CSMR_PRC , EMP_PRC , LWET_PRC_SECT_CD , SALE_PRC , APL_PRM_NO , DC_SECT_CD , GOD_DC_RT , DC_PRC , LAST_SALE_PRC_APL_CPN_PRM_NO , CPN_DC_SECT_CD , CPN_DC_RT , LAST_SALE_PRC , SALE_IDEX , BST_GOD_SALE_IDEX , NEW_GOD_IDEX , NEW_GOD_RECENT_IDEX , NEW_GOD_SORT_SEQ , SALE_IDEX_SORT_SEQ , UDT_DT FROM DSP_GOD_PRC WHERE 1 = 1 AND MALL_ID = #{mallId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GOD_NO = #{godNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND PRC_SECT_CD = #{prcSectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND LANG_CD = #{langCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
